title: Wukong Bug
body: after using wukong in game I died to other champion then after I re spawned he went into stone visual effect like the effect when he dies and turns into stone, was using radiant wukong skin not sure if that bug is only with that skin but very annoying I'm sure others could see I was all grey stone looking saying "is that a bug" so yeah please fix thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Utekaditsu! 
Thanks for the report! We have a fix ready to go out for this in 8.7. Sorry for the trouble! <3

When you die, Wukong stay grey for the rest of the game, which is sad, because I really love that skin :(
